short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THE BEST TIPS AND ADVICE FOR SURFERS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GuruSurfing's mission is to provide expert tips and advice for surfers, regardless whether you are a new, recreational or a competitive surfer. Its vision is to spread the love of surf to the community and to enable people to be passionate in the sport, while helping to find the best deals. 

The extension provides surfing information from the following websites:
Surf Board - https://www.ultimategearlists.com/gear-reviews/best-surfboards
Surf Gears- https://surfd.com/best-surf-products/
Surf Trips - https://www.perfectwavetravel.com/surf-trips/
Swells Check - https://www.surf-forecast.com/
Surf Championships - https://www.worldsurfleague.com/
